If EPS growth (snapshot ~13.7%) turns negative while revenue growth remains low-single-digit, reassess durability of earnings leverage.
trade_of_the_day.why_now: This is a bootstrap rebalance (no prior portfolio) into a Quality+Momentum basket. MSFT offers the strongest verifiable quality stack in the retrieved dataset (high margins, high ROE, strong interest coverage) while remaining a core beneficiary of multi-year cloud/AI capex cycles; the near-term (30d) setup also benefits if the current growth/AI drawdown stabilizes and mean-reverts.
